name: Match Puzzle
description:
Look, these beautiful items are thrown away everywhere, let's put them away.

A seemingly simple task requires you to concentrate and have enough patience, and in the end you will be rewarded generously.
Stunning stress relief function, ultra-realistic physical effects give you a natural touch, making every click you make is full of fun.


When you store enough items, brand new items will also be unlocked.
So many exquisite items, satisfy your desire to collect.


Do you like lottery? no problem.


There are a variety of magic props, more fun.
